name: Mygale lasiodora

Mind: Delirious, restless, sad; fears death; despondent
Face: Tongue dry and parched; put out with difficulty
Mouth and eyes open in rapid succession
Extremities: Convulsive, UNCONTROLLABLE MOVEMENTS OF ARMS AND LEGS
Intense redness in streaks, following course of lymphatics

details: Weakness, palpitation, nervousness, fear, like other spider preparations. Chorea is the principal therapeutic field of this. Sexual symptoms are important.
